fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a dead evildoer to serve at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- On any night you are alive, you may choose a dead player to serve for the rest of the game. They cannot be a Town, Neutral Evil, or Neutral Benign role.

- After you choose an evildoer to serve, you will still appear to be a Necromorph, however, your statistics and immunities will conform to theirs. If you die, you will be revealed as a Necromorph.

- You will be able to perform all of the abilities of the evildoer you are serving. If they had a charge limit to their ability, you will gain whatever charges they had left when they died.

- You will be able to freely speak with the evildoer you're serving during the night. If they were in a night chat while alive, you will gain access to it.

- All evildoers will be notified that there is a Necromorph when they die.

- You have one bulletproof vest that grants you Powerful defense until you are attacked by a non-Town role for the first time. You will lose this vest after choosing an evildoer to serve.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Help a dead evildoer achieve their cause.
